Reviews.Title: Daughter loves it
Reviews.Author: Jacenta Best
Reviews.Content: First laptop screen did not work properly right out of the box, however WolVol replied to email within in hours of sending (On New Years Day no less) and gave us quick and easy instructions. New one was sent out ASAP and has no issues. Perfect for our needs (basic email, games, apps).

Reviews.Title: All good
Reviews.Author: Connie Meek
Reviews.Content: The computer works well, good size and perfect for grandson.I will be interested to hear what software works and how he uses it for school.

Reviews.Title: worst laptop ever
Reviews.Author: luisdabeast55
Reviews.Content: this "laptop" is very very bad its prety much like an android phone but most apps from play store dont even run 2nd this laptop cannot go on full big websites only on mobile ones wich sucks because its suppose to be a "laptop" i am really upset i boght this prudoct but what i hate the most was my mistake of not returning it i really wish i could get my money back because i use my iphone instead of this useless device on my iphone i can go on full websites it gives me the option and i can use google docs and write emails wich i cannot do on the "laptop" it should just be called a android phone with a keyboard and not touch screen really my worst purchase ever i regret it dont buy this prudoct its useless for normal laptop actions dont buy it.

Reviews.Title: good for basics
Reviews.Author: DogGirlAtHeart
Reviews.Content: It's a good computer if you only need to do the basics.  It has wifi and internet, which is nice, but you can only have one thing open at a time and it's really slow.  If you're trying to drag a picture from the internet to office, it won't let you do that.If you want something that just does basic tasks, this is right for you.  If you want something that actually does complex things, choose a different computer.

Reviews.Title: it is ok, I guess
Reviews.Author: Aman
Reviews.Content: Feels cheap. Battery life terrible. You get what you pay for, spend an extra $100 and get  something much better.

Reviews.Title: WolVol 10 inch laptop
Reviews.Author: Edward Allard
Reviews.Content: It lived up to my expectations and that is rare for me with on line purchases. It helped in my work.

Reviews.Title: Not what was expected.
Reviews.Author: Dr. Chuck Wolfe "Dr. Charles R. Wolfe, III"
Reviews.Content: This item didn't do what we had hoped it would. Don't spend your money here, buy a Kindle Fire!Customer service was very nice and helpful when we returned the item.

Reviews.Title: Fast Shipping; Mobile & Professional Look
Reviews.Author: Hooi Li Ooi
Reviews.Content: I don't know the quality of this product yet, because it arrived one day earlier than the scheduled date, which is already a very fast shipping duration (a priority 2 day from the USPS). Kudos to the shipping crew !! From the look of it, I'm very pleased with packaging of the product. Simple, yet very efficient, and meets the need. Perfect for a Christmas present !!! Looks very professionally handled!I will write more as I spend a little more time with actually using the laptop. I love the look of it. Looks very mobile & professional :)
